name: Sarmale Bistro
description: Experience Romania's culinary heart at Sarmale Bistro. Savor classics with a modern touch in our intimate, authentic ambiance. Celebrate timeless tradition.

name: Halász Fogadó
description: Immerse in Eastern European authenticity at Halász Fogadö. Relish traditional dishes amid an atmosphere rich in charm and history. Join us for a timeless culinary experience.

name: La Piața
description: Discover a fusion of Europe's flavors at La Piața, set in the heart of the city. Savor dishes from locally-sourced ingredients in our cozy bistro ambiance.

name: Gospoda Krakowska
description: Indulge in classic Polish recipes in a quaint setting, reminiscent of Warsaw's charm.

name: Kék Duna Étterem
description: Set on the banks of the Danube, enjoy meals that resonate with the city's heartbeat.

name: Móló Rózsa Étterem
description: With a stunning view, indulge in seafood delicacies that tantalize the taste buds.

name: Paradicsom Étterem
description: Take a culinary journey through Hungary's diverse and flavorful heritage.

name: Smaczne Pierogi
description: Home to Poland's favorites, every bite is a reminder of traditional Polish hospitality.

name: Fisherman's Hut
description: A haven for seafood lovers, offering fresh catches in a delightful riverside setting.

name: Casa del Gusto
description: Relive the romance of Italy with dishes crafted with passion and flair.

name: Brânza și Mămăligă
description: A cozy spot that captures the essence of Transylvania, with dishes to match.

name: Szép Étterem
description: A traditional Hungarian spot offering local delicacies and an authentic dining experience.

name: Czerwona Karczma
description: Tucked away in Krakow, this eatery showcases Poland's culinary traditions.

name: Trattoria Bella
description: Experience the beauty of Italian cuisine in a setting that complements every dish.

name: Vivace Ristorante
description: Savor Italy's finest dishes in an ambiance that's as vibrant as its food.
